items.sentence: The last time I spoke to Tom, he said he wasn\'t planning to go to Boston.
I think it\'s time for me to stop allowing her to always have her own way.
It appeared to me that Tom wasn\'t doing what he was supposed to be doing.
Even if I\'d been invited to Tom\'s party, I probably wouldn\'t have gone.
Tom was the only one who even attempted to do something about the problem.
